entry.title: Fourth of July
entry.summary:
No Open Night July 4th

Due to the holiday, we're postponing our monthly meeting from Tuesday, July 4th to Tuesday, July 11th.

Nor will we hold our weekly Open Night.
entry.content:
No Open Night July 4th

Due to the holiday, we're postponing our monthly meeting from Tuesday, July 4th to Tuesday, July 11th.

Nor will we hold our weekly Open Night.

entry.title: Arduino Day 2017
entry.summary:
This Saturday, April 1, is Arduino Day worldwide.

We'll be at Interlock celebrating all things Arduino from 1pm to 7pm, so please join us.
entry.content:
This Saturday, April 1, is Arduino Day worldwide.

We'll be at Interlock celebrating all things Arduino from 1pm to 7pm, so please join us.

entry.title: Open Night CANCELLED due to weather
entry.summary:
Interlock Rochester has CANCELLED our regularly-scheduled Tuesday Open Night for Tuesday, March 14, 2017 from 7pm to 9pm due to the winter storm.

Please be sure to visit us some other Tuesday night.
entry.content:
Interlock Rochester has CANCELLED our regularly-scheduled Tuesday Open Night for Tuesday, March 14, 2017 from 7pm to 9pm due to the winter storm.

Please be sure to visit us some other Tuesday night.
